EmailTemplate.description: HR System Access Request form prepared for another user
EmailTemplate.name: OHR Forms Submission Confirm - submitted by other person
EmailTemplate.subject: An HR System Access Request form has been prepared for your review
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
An HR System Access Request form has been prepared for your review by {!Forms__c.Form_Owner__c}!
When you are ready, please go to https://forms.epa.gov. Then click on "My Forms" and look for the form with the Record ID {!Forms__c.Name}. Click "Open Form" and review the information prepared for you. Once complete, submit the form for approval using the Submit button on the form.
